meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>go</kanji> on a <kanji>trip</kanji> you're taking a <vocabulary>trip</vocabulary>. This is <vocabulary>travel</vocabulary>. You should try to do this occasionally! Perhaps a nice 旅行 to Japan?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
